channel.title: TIP: Control which action groups are visible in keyboard and list on iOS
channel.description:
![action-group-visibility|690x336](upload://l2qraF5LzzCsV9URLPBgu4eHEFO.png)
Using the "Visibility" settings when [editing an Action Group](https://getdrafts.com/actions/actiongroups), you can control which groups appear as options in both the [extended keyboard](https://getdrafts.com/editor/keyboard) and the in the action list sidebar and [quick access tabs](https://forums.getdrafts.com/t/tip-switch-action-groups-with-quick-access-tabs/1022) at the bottom of the action list.
You can even choose to hide a group in both places and it will still be available to edit when you manage all groups.
